features: 4.2-fluid ounce tube of Neutrogena Deep Clean Invigorating Foaming Gel Facial Scrub to revive your skin and wash away dirt, oil, and bacteria
This exfoliating facial cleanser is formulated with glycerin and cleans deep, leaving skin feeling refreshed and exhilarated
Its light gel formula lathers into a tingly, bubbly foam to remove dirt, oil and makeup and cleans deep to remove skin of impurities
Made without plastic microbeads, the dermatologist-tested foaming facial scrub contains gentle exfoliators to sweep away dead skin

From a dermatologist-recommended brand, daily exfoliating face wash leaves skin refreshed with a surge of invigoration. It makes the perfect addition to your daily beauty and skincare routine for an at-home self-care experience
body.description: Product Description Revive your skin and enliven your senses with Neutrogena Deep Clean Invigorating Foaming Facial Scrub. This exfoliating facial cleanser cleans deep and helps leave skin feeling refreshed and exhilarated. Dermatologist-tested, the light gel formula lathers into a tingly, bubbly foam that washes away dirt, oil, and bacteria and removes surface makeup with gentle exfoliators that work to sweep away dead skin. This invigorating, cooling gel face scrub goes deep into pores to remove skin of impurities. From a dermatologist recommended skincare brand, this daily exfoliating face wash leaves skin with a fresh, clean and energized look. It makes the perfect addition to your daily beauty and skincare routine for an at-home self-care experience Brand Story By Neutrogena

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutrogena Deep Clean Invigorating Foaming Cleanser This exfoliating facial cleanser cleans deep down to pores and leaves skin feeling refreshed and exhilarated. Its light gel formula lathers into a tingly, bubbly foam to remove dirt, oil and makeup and goes deep into pores to remove skin of impurities. Made without plastic microbeads, this dermatologist-tested foaming facial scrub contains energizing exfoliators to sweep away dead skin cells.

Cleanse Try cleansing your skin of makeup, dirt and oil with Neutrogena Deep Clean Invigorating Foaming Scrub. Treat Toner and serum can help prep and treat your skin. Moisturize Apply your favorite moisturizer to hydrate and treat your skin. Protect Consider sunscreen, if your moisturizer doesn't contain any, to protect your skin against the damaging effects of the sun, when used with other sun protection measures.

Neutrogena Deep Clean Invigorating Foaming Cleanser Neutrogena Alcohol Free Toner Neutrogena Oil-Free Moisture for Combination Skin Neutrogena Oil-Free Moisture with SPF 35 Use for Cleanse Treat Moisturize Moisturize, Protect Key Ingredient Glycerin Mild Purifiers, Alcohol-Free Castor Oil-Derived SPF 35 Target Areas Face Face Face, Shiny Zones Face Scent Scented Scented Fragrance Free Fragrance Free Non-Comedogenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewerName: Rosita, my face wash is excellent it did the job use it. I use it every three days. Love it.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use my face wash to wash my face. I don’t wash my face with soap. I use this deep clean invigorating foaming scrub face wash every night to wash my face. After I use my Neutrogena triple age night repair moisturizer, When I get up in the morning my face is nice and smooth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful minty clean feeling!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite face wash! Wont use anything else.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this face wash. It exfoliates your skin and does not dry out your skin. I have extremely sensitive skin and have used this face wash for over 10 years now. This face wash will work with any skin type (dry, oily, acne prone, etc). I would highly recommend this product to anyone as it is a quality product for a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a maniacal product.
reviews.reviewText: I try to not use it so often because it dries my face a lot but works like a charm. I’ll use a softer face wash and if my face breaks out I’ll use this and moisturizer, within the week my face is clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Makes my face skin cleaned and fresh

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Revitalize Your Skin with Neutrogena Deep Clean Invigorating Foaming Facial Scrub!
reviews.reviewText: Neutrogena's Deep Clean Invigorating Foaming Facial Scrub with Glycerin has become an essential part of my skincare routine, and for good reason.First and foremost, this scrub delivers on its promise of invigoration. The refreshing, tingling sensation as it foams up on your skin is a wake-up call for your face. It's like a spa treatment right in your own bathroom.The glycerin in the formula ensures that while it exfoliates, it also moisturizes, leaving my skin feeling soft and hydrated, not tight or dry like some other scrubs. I have combination skin, and this scrub strikes the perfect balance for me.The exfoliating beads are gentle yet effective, helping to remove dead skin cells and leaving my complexion visibly brighter. I've noticed a significant reduction in blackheads and a smoother texture since incorporating this product into my routine.What's also great is that a little goes a long way. Just a small amount creates a rich lather, so a single tube lasts quite a while, making it a budget-friendly choice for skincare enthusiasts.Overall, Neutrogena Deep Clean Invigorating Foaming Facial Scrub with Glycerin is a must-have for anyone seeking a revitalizing and effective facial scrub. It has become my go-to, and I can't recommend it enough for achieving a refreshed and glowing complexion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delightful cool feeling
reviews.reviewText: I feel fresh after using. The “scrub” is gentle, yet effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Es un producto que hace lo que dice y hasta de más, no lastima la piel, limpia bien y a mí me ayudó bastante es muy bueno

It’s quite rush and strong like mint when you apply it but it soon settles in. Makes my eyes teary whenever I apply it but it works very well. I usually apply it when I wake up and I do my chores before taking it off so that I give it time on my skin. I recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 8, 2016
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, unfortunately the Botle was damaged but I used this in the past and it works well on my skin.
Me gustó que deja una rica sensación de frescura y olor delicioso pero tiene muy pocos granulos exfoliantes, no sientes que te limpia a profundidad!
